trans-unit.source: Contains a list of possible states for the audio input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Zawiera listę możliwych stanów wejście audio do aparatu rozpoznawania mowy.

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the audio input state of the speech recognition engine with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Można uzyskać stanu wejściowego audio aparat rozpoznawania mowy z <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Właściwości.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events are raised when the audio input state of a speech recognition engine changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>i <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzenia są wywoływane, gdy stan zmiany aparat rozpoznawania mowy wejściowe audio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Receiving silence or non-speech background noise.
trans-unit.target: Odbieranie wyciszenia lub szumu tła z systemem innym niż mowy.
